name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in crafting high-performance solutions utilizing **Python**, **JavaScript**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **AWS** and **Azure** cloud services. My proficiency includes developing scalable applications with a focus on RESTful APIs, adopting agile methodologies, and ensuring collaboration through effective **Git** version control.

I have successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms in the healthcare and financial sectors, consistently delivering tailored solutions that integrate AI/ML capabilities for enhanced predictive analytics and intelligent automation. With a strong background in full-stack development, I leverage frameworks such as **FastAPI** and **Django** to build robust applications that comply with industry standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.

My additional strengths in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation allow me to design secure, efficient systems. I am adept at problem-solving and managing time effectively, which ensures project milestones are met without compromising quality. Furthermore, I possess hands-on experience with MLOps workflows and machine learning pipelines using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, enabling me to serve ML models in production successfully.
